{"step_by_step_thinking": "Omega-9 fatty acids are a family of unsaturated fats that are commonly found in vegetable and animal fats. These fatty acids are also known as oleic acids. Therefore, the ω9 family is represented by oleic acid. Linoleic acid and Linolenic acid are omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids respectively, and Arachidonic acid is a type of omega-6 fatty acid.", "answer_choice": "A"}
